summary: My edit of UNP Simply Clothes. Now this set has gloves too and new looks. In addition i made a fitting UNP Body retexture (Tattoos and some dirt) + new female head texture which has camouflage on it  =) + Yaksha SAVEGAME!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/iw884p.jpg[/img]

This is my edit of UNP Simply Clothes. Now this set has gloves too and new looks. In addition i made a fitting UNP Body retexture (Tattoos and some dirt) + new female head texture which has camouflage on it  =) + SAVEGAME! (level 1, Yaksha Race)

P.S. - This armor actually has stats (light armor), but it will replace original if you have it installed, this is a standalone, full replacer which has all files needed to run.


[size=5]Changes to Simply clothes:[/size]

¤ Tank-top is no darker and with camouflage pattern + it has gaps (holes?) in the front and on the back.

¤ Shorts now have darker texture too.

¤ No swirly kneesocks - they weren\'t \'\'badass\'\' enough >:]

¤ Boots are darker.

¤ Gloves added (with bare knuckles FTW!)


[size=5]To obtain you can:[/size]

¤ Type \"Help Simply 4\"  in console

¤ Craft it at the forge (Should work now for all parts)


---------------------------------
[size=5]BODY TEXTURES[/size]
---------------------------------

I retextured UNP body so that it has many tattoos all over it ^_^ + some dirt for realism. I will also give you the chance to download the .PSD file for body, in case some tattoos are not in your taste.

P.S. - In screenshots i used Normal UNP Body + RANs head mesh \"Type D\"

[size=5]CREDITS and Thank\'s to:[/size]

¤ Petrovich for UNP Simply Clothes:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16658

¤ Dimon99 for his Dimonised UNP Body:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

¤ Nausicaa36 for Desert Wind-CBBE3 gloves:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17045
author: Agito
